design_system.name: Eden Tactical Ops
design_system.description: A high-end, AAA gaming-inspired design system focusing on tactical aesthetics, metallic textures, and gamified progression elements.

Card.base_classes: relative bg-zinc-900/80 border border-white/10 overflow-hidden backdrop-blur-md
Card.instructions: Use the 'chamfer' clip-path for all cards. Add a subtle top border gradient using a pseudo-element to simulate a light source.

Button.base_classes: relative font-rajdhani font-bold uppercase tracking-wider transition-all duration-200 active:scale-95

Badge.base_classes: inline-flex items-center justify-center px-3 py-1 text-xs font-bold uppercase tracking-widest

ProgressBar.container: h-4 bg-zinc-900/50 border border-white/10 skew-x-[-12deg] overflow-hidden

Navigation.item: flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-3 text-zinc-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 transition-colors border-l-2 border-transparent hover:border-orange-500

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Apply 'drop-shadow-[0_0_5px_rgba(255,255,255,0.5)]' to simulate neon tubes.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to 'frontend/src/index.css' immediately.
2. GLOBAL STYLES: Update 'frontend/src/index.css' to set the body background to #09090B and apply the background texture with low opacity (5%).
3. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Do not delete Shadcn components. Instead, wrap them or apply the 'chamfer' clip-path and custom colors via className overrides.
4. REMOVE EMOJIS: Replace all emojis with Lucide icons. Use specific colors for meaning (Green=Check, Red=Alert, Orange=Action).
5. GAMIFICATION: Implement the 'Battle Pass' style progress bars on the Harvest page. Use the 'skew-x-[-12deg]' utility heavily for that 'fast/tactical' look.
6. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element has a data-testid attribute.
universal_guidelines: Do not center align the app container.
Use named exports for components, default for pages.
